articles.content: A new marine predator rivalry is emerging in the waters of Australia, shaking up the long-established hierarchy of the oceans. The great white shark, long feared as the apex predator of the seas, is … [+3238 chars]

articles.author: James Felton
articles.title: Amateur Astrophotographer Photographs NASA Astronaut Conducting Record-Breaking Space Walk - IFLScience
articles.description: Suni Williams conducted a record-breaking spacewalk outside the ISS. An amateur astrophotographer photographed her from Earth.
articles.content: An amateur astrophotographer has captured an astonishing image of NASA astronaut Suni Williams conducting a record-breaking spacewalk outside the International Space Station (ISS).Last week, NASA ast… [+2898 chars]
